thread.title: CRH to Buy U.S. Glazing Company C.R. Laurence for $1.3 Billion
thread.title_full: CRH to Buy U.S. Glazing Company C.R. Laurence for $1.3 Billion - WSJ

author: Ed Ballard
title: CRH to Buy U.S. Glazing Company C.R. Laurence for $1.3 Billion
text:
CRH PLC on Thursday reported a slight increase in net profit for the six months to June 30 as the Irish building materials group also announced it was paying $1.3 billion to buy U.S. glazing products company C.R. Laurence Co.
The Dublin-based company said net profit rose to €46 million ($52.2 million) from €45 million a year earlier, slightly above an analyst estimate of €43 million. Revenue increased 13% to €9.37 billion from...
